meanings.definition: To separate and eliminate waste products from the body
meanings.sent1: The body excretes waste through urine and feces.
meanings.sent2: Animals excrete waste to keep their bodies healthy.
meanings.sent3: The little robot excretes tiny bolts and nuts when it's scared.
meanings.sent4: The factory excretes smoke like a dragon breathing fire.
meanings.sent5: The tree excretes sap to protect itself from insects.

meanings.definition: To discharge waste matter from the body
meanings.sent1: After eating, the body excretes what it doesn't need.
meanings.sent2: Birds excrete waste to keep their nests clean.
meanings.sent3: The old car excretes oil like a leaky faucet.
meanings.sent4: The volcano excretes lava in a fiery display of power.
meanings.sent5: The flower excretes pollen to attract bees for pollination.

meanings.definition: To release waste products from the body
meanings.sent1: Our bodies excrete toxins to stay healthy.
meanings.sent2: Fish excrete ammonia as a waste product.
meanings.sent3: The machine excretes excess oil like a greasy mess.
meanings.sent4: The storm clouds excrete rain, refreshing the earth.
meanings.sent5: The plant excretes oxygen, vital for all living beings.
